dct_title_s: Energy map of Trinidad & Tobago / Petroleum Economist Cartographic ; produced by Petroleum Economist Ltd. ; sponsored by the National Gas Company of Trinidad and Tobago Limited, bhpbilliton, BG Trinidad & Tobago, Petrotrin ; designed by P. Bush and K. Fuller. (Map)
dct_description_sm: Relief and depths shown by shading and gradient tints. Title from panel. "©September 2014." Shows gas fields, oil fields, gas pipelines, oil pipelines, oil refineries, and tanker terminals. "Petroleum Economist cartographic energy maps." Includes text, 1 inset, 4 ancillary maps, text, 2 statistical tables, and 9 graphs. Ancillary maps: Trinidad and Tobago LNG export destinations 2013 (million m³ of LNG) -- Petrotrin 100% interest and joint venture blocks -- Trinidad and Tobago deepwater area for development -- Trinidad and Tobago territorial waters.
